commit_types.editorial: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
commit_types.refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
commit_types.perf: A code change that improves performance
commit_types.test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
commit_types.ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts or that affect the build system or external dependencies
commit_types.chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
commit_types.data: Changes related to test data, ML datasets, their definitions and metadata
